settingsPane.description: Here you can tune CPU functions in kernel
settingsPane.name: CPU Tuning

spinner.description: Control Over MAX allowed CPU frequency! here you can have normal 2.3GHz max or higher OC up to 2.8GHz! or you can limit to only 2.0GHz for battery save, when you set the value here all other apps or services can't set frequency higher! so if you want more come here and change
spinner.name: OC Max Frequency Control

spinner.description: This will set the CPU governor. Default CPU governor will only be set during early stages of booting (before init.d execution), and can be overridden by any other scripts or applications.
spinner.name: Default CPU Governor

spinner.description: Touch booster Control, when you touch the screen and scroll, CPU will boost frequency to tuned one to help reducing LAG and allow fast and smooth device. too high frequency will use more power. default is 1.574Ghz
spinner.name: Touch Boost Frequency

spinner.description: When using ONDEMAND CPU Governor, you can have 2 modes! one for power save! and one for performance!, on power save frequency will go up slower and try to not use high OC even if set! max 2.26Ghz, when performance mode selected, then full frequency is allowed and delivered with max power.
spinner.name: Ondemand Power Save Switch

checkbox.description: Enable or Disable CPU-Tweaks below! if ON then kernel will obey only STweaks and set the below frequency on screen OFF and ON
checkbox.name: CPU-Tweaks
checkbox.label: CPU-Tweaks

spinner.description: Maximum CPU-Speed. You can tune the MAX CPU frequency, DEPEND ON CPU-Tweaks ON ABOVE! (Default: 2265600 kHz)
spinner.name: Max CPU Frequency

spinner.description: Minimum CPU-Speed. You can tune the MIN CPU frequency, MIN frequency can't be higher than MAX frequency!, DEPEND ON CPU-Tweaks ON ABOVE! (Default: 300000 kHz)
spinner.name: Min CPU Frequency

spinner.description: Maximum allowed frequency when screen is OFF and phone is awake by any app that hold wakelock, as music app or etc. when screen will be ON, normal max allowed frequency will be set, this is only for screen OFF.
spinner.name: MAX Screen OFF CPU Frequency

settingsPane.description: Here you can tune CPU Thermal Controls
settingsPane.name: CPU Thermal

spinner.description: CPU Thermal control, Can be Default driver without controls, or Intelligent Thermal driver with controls below, it will limit CPU frequency when CPU reach the max limit heat, till cooled and restore full power, this can help with too hot phone playing games! intelligent driver is more aggressive and drop frequency to 1.4 then to 1.2 that will reduce performance in all bench apps! Default will lock on 1.7GHz most of the time, and burn the fingers but give you more SCORE to show off.
spinner.name: CPU Temp Control

checkbox.description: Enable or Disable CPU Cores ON and OFF based on Cores HEAT set below, if OFF! then all cores work but get low frequency on high temp! if ON! then cores turned off to help with CPU cooling, but loose performance! very bad for bench show off apps! but good for heat stability
checkbox.name: CPU Core Controls
checkbox.label: CPU Cores Control

seekBar.description: Here you can change CORES max HEAT before turning OFF cores from 3 to 1 and keep normal phone heat, if you tune above CPU max TEMP below, then all cores will stay ON when overheated! This will work only with Intelligent Temp Control ON!!!
seekBar.name: CORE Max Heat

seekBar.description: Here you can change CPU max HEAT before throttled down to cool and keep normal phone heat, depend on CPU Thermal control ON!
seekBar.name: CPU Max Heat

settingsPane.description: Here you can tune CPU Hot Plug and CPU Governors
settingsPane.name: Global HOTPLUG

spinner.description: CPU HotPlug Control, you can switch from OLD LG Default Hot Plug driver to MSM Hot Plug, Intelligent Hot Plug or Alucard driver, note that using Intelligent CPU Thermal control with Default LG Hot Plug is not recommended! low performance
spinner.name: Hot Plug Driver

spinner.description: Hot Plug additional CPU control, here you can tune how much cores will be active on high short load, default is 2 cores for 4sec, if you wish to save more power when using MSM or Intelligent Hot Plug then best to use 1 core. or if performance is what you prefer then use 2 cores boost. Depend on MSM or Intelligent Hot Plug selected!
spinner.name: Hot Plug CPU Booster

spinner.description: Maximum allowed CPU Cores to be online when needed. you can have ECO mode that will limit CPU to have 2 cores, Strict mode will limit CPU to only 1 core! this mod will work with all custom hot plugs! default LG hot plug is not supported. this set is stronger than MIN cores online below!
spinner.name: Max Cores online

spinner.description: Minimum CPU Cores online, here you can set minimum CPU cores online nonstop when screen is ON. by default we have only one core online when device is idle, you can set 2,3,4 if you wish, this will give you much more smooth device, but will drain more power and heat up some more. default is NORMAL one core ON all the reset sleep till needed. this setting is weaker than MAX cores online! above! if there you set 2 and here 4, you get 2 cores max
spinner.name: Min CPU Online
